text: Is there a way of testing blog post templates easily without setting up a new blog?
Is this on a site with an existing blog you want to update or on a site that does not yet have a blog?
When I swap the positions of the border-top and border-bottom rules, it looks like it renders correctly  - but it really shouldn't be making this kind of change in the first place.
Existing :slightly_smiling_face: Was just checking in to see if anyone has a better solution that setting up a whole new test blog and noindexing it :slightly_smiling_face:
I have done that. I know it is annoying. You could just update the template and not publish the templates. The previewer lets you see the changes with different blogs.
